data.title: Melville climate: Weather Melville & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Melville

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Melville

>>average temperature by month Melville

>>Weather Melville

The prevailing weather conditions in the area are characterized by a cold and moderate climate. Melville has a significant amount of rainfall during the year. This is true even for the driest month. Köppen and Geiger classify this climate as Dfb. The average annual temperature is 2.5 °C | 36.5 °F in Melville. Approximately 566 mm | 22.3 inch of rainfall occurs on a yearly basis.

The location Melville is in the northern hemisphere. Summer begins at the end of June and ends in September. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Melville

In terms of precipitation, the month with the lowest amount of rainfall is February, recording a mere 16 mm | 0.6 inch in its entirety. This denotes an exceptionally dry period within that particular time frame. With an average of 106 mm | 4.2 inch, the most precipitation falls in June.

average temperature by month Melville

The month that experiences the highest temperatures throughout the year is referred to as July, where an average temperature of 18.7 °C | 65.6 °F prevails. January has the lowest average temperature of the year. It is -14.4 °C | 6.0 °F.

Melville weather and climate for every month

Airport close to Melville

The closest Airports of Melville are: Regina International Airport (YQR) 141.59km,Saskatoon John G. Diefenbaker International Airport (YXE) 301.86km

You can reach Melville from this Cities by Plane: Toronto (YYZ), Calgary (YYC), Edmonton (YEG), Las Vegas (LAS), Vancouver (YVR), Winnipeg (YWG)
